column4: sometimes when i'm on sites like purevolume that use streaming audio (flash) i cannot hear anything...other times theres no problems..anyone had this problem?
It normally depends if something else has the sound card and how the browser is talking to the sound card (using ESD, Alsa or directly) - it can get messy
is there anything in the wiki you know of that could help me troubleshoot?
I don't know the wiki contents well
